oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Accretion disks around a mass with quadrupole
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Abishev, Medeu
Boshkayev, Kuantay
Quevedo, Hernando
Toktarbay, Saken
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: General Relativity and Quantum Cosmology
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We consider the stability properties of test particles moving along circular orbits around a mass with quadrupole. We show that the quadrupole modifies drastically the properties of an accretion disk made of such test particles.
Comment: submitted to the proceedings of ICGAC-12 http://rgs.vniims.ru/icgac12.htm, 2 pages
